login.merciDetail: Your request has been sent successfully. We will process it as soon as possible. You will receive a response by email shortly.

parametresPage.title: School Settings
parametresPage.departemenLine: The ESI - SBA brings together <1> 2 ​​departments </1> specialized to offer excellent training.
parametresPage.sallesLine: The ESI - SBA has more than <1>30 modern rooms</1>, adapted to the needs of students and teachers.
parametresPage.specialiteLine: ESI - SBA offers <1>3 innovative specializations</1> in IT.
